descriptionHtml:
Current Version; 1.0.0

This mod will allow user\'s to finally feel that they are using the right type of arrows. Currently the files in Skyrim arrows selection was simply not high enough damage compared to others, this is now fixed. This mod will not break your game, it will simply over-write the current damage of the arrows already in-game meaning that you will feel the effects of this soon as you go and range!

========Release Notes========

-=-=-1.0.1-=-=-
- Optimal file added, you can now pick 50% damage increase or 25% damage increase.
- Buffed arrow damage by 25% of what the orginal was.


-=-=-1.0.0-=-=-
- Initial Release
- Buffed arrow damage by 50% of what the orginal was.
author: Soto-bobsbees

files.name: Balanced Arrow Mod Version 25 Percent damage increase
